statements: UPDATE ContentPerformanceMetrics SET engagement_rate = 0.75, conversion_rate = 0.12 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ContentPerformanceMetrics SET page_views = 1000, engagement_rate = 0.85 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE ContentPerformanceMetrics SET engagement_rate = 0.8, conversion_rate = 0.05 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ContentPerformanceMetrics SET page_views = page_views + 100 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE page_views SET view_count = 1000, timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE page_id = 123
UPDATE content_metrics SET conversion_rate = 2.75, engagement_rate = 4.50 WHERE content_id = 456
UPDATE page_views SET view_count = view_count + 1, timestamp = NOW() WHERE page_id = 10;
UPDATE content_metrics SET engagement_rate = 0.85, conversion_rate = 0.70 WHERE content_id = 20;
UPDATE page_views SET views = 100 WHERE page_id = 1;
UPDATE conversion_rates SET rate = 0.75, time_stamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE page_id = 2;
UPDATE page_views SET views = views + 1 WHERE page_id = 1;
UPDATE engagement_rates SET rate = 0.75, time_stamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE page_id = 2;
UPDATE PageViews SET page_views = 100 WHERE page_id = 1;
UPDATE Users SET user_name = 'John Doe', user_email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE PageViews SET page_views = 1000, date_recorded = '2022-10-15' WHERE page_id = 123 AND page_url = 'example.com/about'
UPDATE Users SET user_email = 'newemail@example.com', date_joined = '2022-10-20' WHERE user_id = 456
UPDATE page_views SET views_count = 100 WHERE page_id = 1;
UPDATE user_profiles SET email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE page_views SET views_count = 1000 WHERE page_id = 5;
UPDATE user_profiles SET username = 'john_doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 10;
